value:
$WmMPID_マーニャ,ch06_26_Magna_F_Normal,Face|Let us begin. As members of the Four
Heavenly Knights of Silesse, we will
show ourselves worthy of that name.$k$p$WmMPID_フュリー,ch06_27_Fury_F_Normal,Face|I am not the person I once was,
Díthorba... I will not yield to
anyone—least of all you!$k$p$WmMPID_ディートバ,ch06_30_Deatoba_F_Normal,Face|Hmph. Big talk for a crybaby...
Don't make me laugh!$k$p
